name: Snek (Focusless)
description:
This is the first game in a series.

I'm attempting to release a game project every day in order to get over my habit of not finishing and releasing what I work on. 

This is a bit of a tech demo. I'm trying to see what interesting stuff is possible to make  by only drawing circles from code.  

Note that it is made on my computer, and I've only really tested it locally. So it is unknown to me how it performs  on all computers.
